chunks.chunk_text: Hello you guys, you are now listening to another episode of English Cafe。每週三來到通勤學英語的English Cafe英語咖啡館,喝一杯老師們的本週主題特調,一起探討國際文化時事、質疑網路和音樂等多元主題輕鬆吸收主題相關的詞彙、慣用語和常用例句。Today we have Clem in the house!Hello everyone!Hello Clem, how are you doing?

chunks.chunk_text: Neither have I.Every year they host these Dragon Boat Races.And sometimes they even host University Aid from all universities.University Aid Dragon Boat.Different universities across the world come and row Dragon Boat in Taiwan.And guess what?We don't care.Why?Because we are foodies in Taiwan.I noticed we are foodies.When we are eating, we don't watch TV.We are eating zongzi.Don't bother us.

chunks.chunk_text: But other than the hu zhou zong, which is long, we also got another interesting zongzi that to me does not look normal.It looks like zongzi for aliens.It's a very yellow zongzi.It's yellow, yellow, yellow.Yes.And I don't know why people call it jian zong.And when I
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_英語咖啡館 Ep.271_ 粽子節又到了之南北大亂鬥 Where do you stand with the different styles of Zhong.json

chunks.chunk_text: was a little boy, my mom says, oh, this is jian zong.Why do we need to pick up the zongzi? 為什麼要剪粽子?Like I don't get it.And she's like, no, this is called jian zong.And I'm like, yeah, but we don't need to cut it. 你沒有要用剪刀啊.Like, so I got so confused because I don't have an understanding for this word.The word is alkaline. 剪性的剪.I didn't get that.It took me a while to learn.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_英語咖啡館 Ep.271_ 粽子節又到了之南北大亂鬥 Where do you stand with the different styles of Zhong.json

chunks.chunk_text: Like my mom had to teach me.And you know what, Clem, in English, it sounds disgusting.It sounds like a science project.It is a science project.It is a science project.Because alkaline, guys, 15 minutes, please understand where I'm coming from.You go to 7-Eleven.You go to the battery section.You go to Duracell.And for Duracell, you buy
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_英語咖啡館 Ep.271_ 粽子節又到了之南北大亂鬥 Where do you stand with the different styles of Zhong.json

chunks.chunk_text: the alkaline batteries.And that does not associate well with zongzi.So I'm like, why do you put battery in your zongzi?
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_英語咖啡館 Ep.271_ 粽子節又到了之南北大亂鬥 Where do you stand with the different styles of Zhong.json

chunks.chunk_text: And somewhere along the line, there's a connection.Okay, so Clem, please educate me.Where's the connection?It's a connection.Well, alkaline zongzi is to make alkaline zongzi.The glutinous rice is soaked in alkaline water.So it's like a science project.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_英語咖啡館 Ep.271_ 粽子節又到了之南北大亂鬥 Where do you stand with the different styles of Zhong.json

chunks.chunk_text: Yeah, it's a science project.And then the rice will be yellow color and chewy texture.Okay, so now my next question is why did somebody go and dip it in alkaline water and think it will taste okay?It's the craziest thing.And the funny story is my grandpa, when I first saw it, I stayed away from it all my life.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_英語咖啡館 Ep.271_ 粽子節又到了之南北大亂鬥 Where do you stand with the different styles of Zhong.json

chunks.chunk_text: My grandpa loves it because he's a sweet tooth.He loves sweet zongzi.So every Dragon Boat Festival, he's sitting there with a yellow triangular zongzi in a plate with a dab of sugar on the side.Oh, so he ate alkaline zongzi with sugar?Yeah, he's a sweet tooth.He likes it sweet, sweet, sweet.Some people will eat it with honey.Okay.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_英語咖啡館 Ep.271_ 粽子節又到了之南北大亂鬥 Where do you stand with the different styles of Zhong.json

chunks.chunk_text: What other sauces can you add?Chocolate sauce?I wouldn't be surprised.Can you add chocolate sauce to it?Do people do that?Well, I think it will be really strange.Okay, well, what else can we add to alkaline zongzi?Condensed milk.Condensed milk sounds pretty good because we add
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_英語咖啡館 Ep.271_ 粽子節又到了之南北大亂鬥 Where do you stand with the different styles of Zhong.json

chunks.chunk_text: condensed milk to our desserts too, to our shaved ice.So that's not too bad.If you like chopping shaved ice, you probably have condensed milk at home.You can add it to alkaline zongzi.And some people will really eat alkaline zongzi with chopping.Okay, okay.To add, to change the texture, right?It will become chewy or crunchy, almost like pudding, glutinous pudding.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_英語咖啡館 Ep.271_ 粽子節又到了之南北大亂鬥 Where do you stand with the different styles of Zhong.json

chunks.chunk_text: Very chewy.Okay.Very chewy, just like gummy.Just like gum.Okay.Well, well, guys, 15 Minutes Fam, you let me know if you're alkaline zongzi guy and how you eat it because I'm keen to know.Yeah, and I hope all the best to you and your science project.Okay, so we've talked about all the interesting zongzi.And one thing I want to quickly add,
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_英語咖啡館 Ep.271_ 粽子節又到了之南北大亂鬥 Where do you stand with the different styles of Zhong.json

chunks.chunk_text: you didn't say haka zongzi.You left haka out in the play.I am half, 50% haka, right?My mom's haka.But guess what?Never had haka zongzi at home.Really?Never had it until I did research for today.So apparently haka zongzi is called ban zong.So they use glutinous rice flour dough.They don't use the rice.They use the rice flour dough.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_英語咖啡館 Ep.271_ 粽子節又到了之南北大亂鬥 Where do you stand with the different styles of Zhong.json

chunks.chunk_text: They don't use the whole rice.Okay.So they like the sticky texture, like almost like maji texture from glutinous rice.They like that.I've never had it.Never had it in my life.Okay.So maybe this year I'll ask my mom for one.You know, where she can get me one.But she never misses it.She never says, oh, I miss haka ban zong.So I don't know.Maybe she's too modern for traditional haka ban zong.Anyways.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_英語咖啡館 Ep.271_ 粽子節又到了之南北大亂鬥 Where do you stand with the different styles of Zhong.json

chunks.chunk_text: The fillings, which refers to the ingredients we put in for haka ban zong is dried radish, which I love, dried tofu.Okay.And sometimes pork.All right.So it's a very interesting mixture because the dried radish is crunchy.Dried tofu is a little hard, right?And the pork obviously adds to the savory flavors.Okay.And that reflects the haka community.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_英語咖啡館 Ep.271_ 粽子節又到了之南北大亂鬥 Where do you stand with the different styles of Zhong.json

chunks.chunk_text: Culinary traditions, pork, radish and tofu.Very haka.Good.Never had it.But if you guys have had, you know, have enjoyed it, let me know, you know, where to get one.I'll probably get one for my mom and see if she remembers this.But at home, we are definitely buying regular zong zi wherever we can get.Okay.Not to piss off you guys, but we just buy whatever we see.So we, yeah.

chunks.chunk_text: Okay.Whether it's Southern zong zi we like and Northern zong zi we like.So we like all zong zi.Yes.Right.So coming back to Clem now.Clem, before you stuck with Southern zong zi, have you tried all the different styles of zong zi?Well, actually, I kind of like Huzhou zong and haka zong.So you didn't say no to all the other zong zi.

chunks.chunk_text: Right.You tried all the zong zi and then you started saying no.Correct.Actually, I just say no to Northern zong zi.Okay.So you have a thing against Northern zong zi.It's just one of those things.You don't know why, but you just dislike it.It shouldn't be there.It shouldn't exist.Well, I know why, because it is only rice and I need to fight.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_英語咖啡館 Ep.271_ 粽子節又到了之南北大亂鬥 Where do you stand with the different styles of Zhong.json

chunks.chunk_text: You insist.Oily rice is oily rice, not zong zi.Yeah.Got it.Fine.We accept your freedom of speech.No, I think that kind of makes sense because you don't want to mix your foods.It's not nice to mix your foods.If it's oily rice, then keep it oily rice.Don't package it and lie to people and say this is zong zi.But I'm going to challenge your blood pressure again.So

chunks.chunk_text: sorry to interrupt, but Clem, go on.And what other zong zi do you like?You said you like the long zong zi.Huzhou zong, haka zong.Alkaline?Alkaline?Not really.Okay.So I'm on the same team as you.Like the science project zong zi.No, thank you.Okay.So you've tried all the zong zi and yet you always go back to Southern zong zi.

chunks.chunk_text: Yeah.Most of the time I'll go back to Southern zong zi, but recently I love the aboriginal zong zi.The Rukai people's abai.Excuse me?These aboriginal people's zong zi?Yeah.Wow.Okay.Aboriginal zong zi.Yeah.Called abai.Yeah.Where can we buy?I think.We can't buy that, right?That's not available anywhere.I think in Hualien, Taitung.Okay.
